snippet.title: Wizard's Legacy | Official Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
♾ Play Now on Meta Quest
https://vr.meta.me/s/2thzr9X3u4AZ0XJ

🎮 Play Now on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2817600?utm_source=youtube?utm_content=trailer

Immerse yourself in a visual feast with incredible mechanics, stunning environments, challenging enemies, and powerful spells. Wizard's Legacy is the ultimate VR adventure that lets you embody a true wizard or warrior. Cast spells with your hands, battle fearsome foes, and uncover the secrets hidden beneath the Corruption. Will you falter as the wiles do or will you rise to the challenge?

Play NOW on Steam and Meta Quest Store! Let the magic be your guide!

👾 Be a part of this magical community:
https://discord.gg/VewwMRF6PA

Follow us for the latest updates:

📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/widegamestudio/
❌ Twitter: https://x.com/WideGameStudio
🔥Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wizardslegacy1
🕸 Website: https://widegamestudio.com/
